titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The object of the St. Paul Presbyterian Alliance was to advance the cause of Christ by promoting mutual acquaintance and Christian fellowship among the members of the Presbyterian Church and congregations in the County of Ramsey and the immediate vicinity, in extending the influence of that denomination, and in aiding in the organization and support of new churches in the region. Alliance churches included Bethlehem, Westminster, House of Hope, Goodrich Ave, Golgotha, and Central, and others.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes of general meetings of the St. Paul Presbyterian Alliance and minutes of meetings of the Alliance's board of directors, 1888-1905. The minutes include the election of officers, reports of the Finance Committee, lists of papers presented at general meetings, and records of distribution of funds to member churches. The volume includes the Alliance's articles of incorporation and by-laws.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
